description: The file provides utility functions for rendering React components within specific context providers, mainly for testing purposes. It wraps components with authentication context and routing context to simulate app environment during testing.

methods.name: renderWithProviders(ui, { route = '/', initialEntries, authWrapper = true } = {})
methods.description: Utility function that renders a React component wrapped with AuthProvider and MemoryRouter, facilitating tests that require authentication and routing contexts.

methods.name: withProviders(ui, options)
methods.description: Helper function that wraps a React component with providers, used for inline rendering in tests.

ctags.name: renderWithProviders
ctags.pattern: /^export function renderWithProviders(ui, { route = '\/', initialEntries, authWrapper = true } = {/
